wally.auth.token.markdownDescription:
A GitHub [personal access token](https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/keeping-your-account-and-data-secure/creating-a-personal-access-token) to use for authentication. 
This can be set to avoid the request limit or to use a private Wally index.

wally.completion.enabled.description: If autocompletion should be enabled or not.

wally.diagnostics.enabled.description: If diagnostics should be enabled or not.

wally.versionLens.enabled.description: If the version lens should be enabled or not.

wally.log.level.markdownDescription:
What should be logged in the `Wally` output channel.
Set to `Quiet` to disable logging completely.
